Name: Coffee Batida
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice and serve with straws
Review: Fortunately this caffeine and cachaça laced cocktail tastes a good deal better than it looks.
Nutrition: One serving of Coffee Batida contains 274 calories
